org.openglove.api.java

Class MessageGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openglove.api.java.MessageGenerator

  • public class MessageGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide methods to generate communication message with the glove, following the OpenGlove communication protocol

    • Method Detail

      • initializeMotor

        public java.lang.String initializeMotor(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> pins)
        Generate a message to initialize pins like motors in the control software
        Parameters:
        pins - List of pins that are initialized
        Returns:
        A string with the "initializeMotor" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • activateMotor

        public java.lang.String activateMotor(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pins,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Generate a message to activate motors. Each motor is activated with the value in the same index
        Parameters:
        pins - List of pins where are connected the motors
        values - List with the intensities to activate the motors. It can be "HIGH" or "LOW" in digital mode or a number bewteen 0 and 255 in analog mode
        Returns:
        A string with the "activateMotor" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • analogRead

        public java.lang.String analogRead(int pin)
        Generate a message to read from an analog pin
        Parameters:
        pin - Number of the pin to be readed
        Returns:
        A string with the "analogRead" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • digitalRead

        public java.lang.String digitalRead(int pin)
        Generate a message to read from a digital pin
        Parameters:
        pin - Number of the pin to be readed
        Returns:
        A string with the "digitalRead" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • pinMode

        public java.lang.String pinMode(int pin,
                                java.lang.String mode)
        Generate a message to initialize a pin in input or output mode
        Parameters:
        pin - Number of the pin to be initialized
        mode - Mode to initialize the pin, it can be "INPUT" or "OUTPUT"
        Returns:
        A string with the "pinMode" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • pinMode

        public java.lang.String pinMode(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pins,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> modes)
        Generate a message to initialize a pin in input or output mode. Each pin is initialized with the mode in the same index
        Parameters:
        pins - List with the numbers of the pins to be initialized
        modes - List with the modes to initialize the pins, it can be "INPUT" or "OUTPUT"
        Returns:
        A string with the "pinMode" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • digitalWrite

        public java.lang.String digitalWrite(int pin,
                                     java.lang.String value)
        Generate a message to write a value in a digital pin
        Parameters:
        pin - Number of the pin to be writed
        value - Value to be write in the pin, it can be "HIGH" or "LOW"
        Returns:
        A string with the "digitalWrite" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

      • digitalWrite

        public java.lang.String digitalWrite(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pins,
                                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Generate a message to write a value in a digital pin. Each pin is write with the value in the same index
        Parameters:
        pins - List with the numbers of the pins to be writed
        values - Lists with the values to be write in the pins, it can be "HIGH" or "LOW"
        Returns:
        A string with the "digitalWrite" format specified in the OpenGlove communication protocol

        Parameters:

        value - Value to be write in the pin, it can be from 0 to 255
